metadata.title: A Continuous Plankton Recorder Monitoring Program for the NE Pacific and Southern Bering Sea.- (Data Support)

creators.name: Oceans Canada, Ocean Sciences & Productivity Division

metadata.description:
These data monitor North Pacific Ocean and  Bering Sea plankton using a towed Hardy  Continuous Plankton Recorder from ships of opportunity.

An NPMR project
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Data to support NPMR project "A continuous Plankton Recorder Monitoring Program for the NE Pacific and Southern Bering Sea."

Status: Planned

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
